players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I'm shocked by Charlie's sudden death. We need to stay vigilant and work together to find out who did this."
Diana: "I'm concerned about the safety of our village after Charlie's death. We should all be truthful and share any information we have to help find the culprit."
